short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helper for coaches to record their sessions

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A comprehensive tool designed to assist coaches in efficiently recording, uploading organizing, and managing their training sessions. So that they can refer to their videos in the future.
